## DatabaseConnection.addAttribute() method

Add attribute to be passed on to backend

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the attribute. |
|  value | any | The value of the attribute. |
